preview_banner.preview_text: You are using a preview of Tornado's revamped UI, which currently does not include all functionalities. Please feel free to test it and, since we strive for improving it constantly, please send us your feedback.

processing_tree.name: Name
processing_tree.select_parent_node_for_new_filter: Select the parent node for new filter
processing_tree.select_parent_node_for_new_ruleset: Select the parent node for new ruleset
processing_tree.delete_filter_confirmation_content: Are you sure you want to delete this filter with all of its contents, including child nodes, rulesets and rules?
processing_tree.delete_ruleset_confirmation_content: Are you sure you want to delete this ruleset with all of its rules?

node_path_not_found_error.title: Node not present in draft
node_path_not_found_error.message: The path {path} was expanded in view mode but is not present in the current draft

errors.opened_node_path_not_found_error: The path {path} was opened in view mode but is not present in the current draft
errors.draft_takeover_generic: There was an error during the draft takeover
errors.draft_deploy_generic: There was an error during the draft deployment
errors.invalid_name: Name is required and can contain only alphanumerical characters or underscores
errors.name_too_long: Name cannot be more than {limit} characters
errors.already_existing_node: A filter with this name already exists

test_window.select_ruleset_to_see_extracted_variable: Select ruleset to see extracted variables
test_window.invalid_created_ms: It must be a valid timestamp

tenant_not_found_error.title: Event not reached
tenant_not_found_error.text: Your event did not reach your processing tree because it was filtered out by a parent node

confirm_deploy_modal.title: Deploy draft in production?
confirm_deploy_modal.content: Do you want to deploy your draft to Tornado? Please ensure that all configurations work properly, as this action is not reversible!

delete_draft_confirmation_modal.title: Delete draft
delete_draft_confirmation_modal.content: Are you sure you want to delete this draft?

takeover_draft_confirmation_modal.title: Takeover draft
takeover_draft_confirmation_modal.content: Are you sure you want to takeover this draft?

edit_mode.an_error_occurred_while_saving_the_draft: An error occurred while saving the draft.

unsaved_changes_modal.title: Unsaved changes
unsaved_changes_modal.content: The draft has unsaved local changes. If you proceed, all unsaved changes will be discarded.
